name: Google Calendar Get Events
description: Retrieves events from a specified calendar.

inputs.name: endpoint
inputs.description: The Google Calendar API endpoint to call

inputs.name: calendarId
inputs.description: Calendar identifier. To retrieve calendar IDs call the calendarList.list method

inputs.name: timeMin
inputs.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for an event's end time to filter by (RFC3339 timestamp)

inputs.name: timeMax
inputs.description: Upper bound (exclusive) for an event's start time to filter by (RFC3339 timestamp)

inputs.name: maxResults
inputs.description: Maximum number of events to return

inputs.name: orderBy
inputs.description: The order of the events returned (startTime, updated)

inputs.name: q
inputs.description: Free text search terms to find events that match

inputs.name: singleEvents
inputs.description: Whether to expand recurring events into instances
